comment: A really easy class, it was my easiest class of the semester. She doesn't give any hard assignments and you build up to the final. Definitely take her.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: The class was pretty easy and interesting as long as you did the work. There are readings, weekly quizzes, discussions, and some other assignments for the final project. It was a lot, but just manage your time and you'll be fine. Dr. Polk was very nice and gave you help if you needed it! Gives you good feedback on discussions and projects.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy
